figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: APA Style, 7th Edition Sample Journal Article Citation (Journal Article References, n.d.)

figure_3.title: Figure 3.
figure_3.caption: Elements with the highest number of errors and Total errors per database

claims.sentence: See Figure 1 for a sample APA 7th edition journal article citation from the APA Manual.

Using the copy button feature resulted in journal names and volume numbers not being italicized.(See Figure 2) Ultimately, reviewers assessed citations based on the copy button results since it is available and featured by the database.

Results were compared and discrepancies were resolved through discussion and consensus.RESULTS
The total number of errors for both databases and the elements with the highest number of errors in each database are displayed in Figure 3.
